name: places/ChIJb-qu06pZwokR2CjUrSwbvQY
adrFormatAddress: 501 5th Ave #604, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
This is my first review ever, so you can imagine the necessity in which I write this review. Going to this doctor was one of the biggest regrets of my life. This doctor spends 2-5 minutes (upper end is generous) per visit, and I’ve been to quite a few.
She is quick to diagnose issues and provide off-label medications that do not solve the issue, but make it worse. I’ve followed her instructions to the exact last detail (not that much detail is provided given the short length of the time spent with the patient) and it only made the problem worse. Moreover, the nurse (or PA) provides different indications on how often the medication should be used. Not that it mattered – because both approaches would have made my medical issue considerably worse.
I then went to a follow-up visit only for the doctor to tell me that my medical issue has improved, which was a bold and false thing to say given that I can see clear evidence to the contrary. I don’t need to be a medical professional to know that my skin condition has gotten worse. Then, of course, the doctor tells me I used the medication incorrectly despite using it exactly the way I was told. And as always, the visit ends within the 5-minute window as described above.
My confidence has been left shattered by this doctor and my medical issue will take many months, even maybe years, to resolve given the damage. I regret ever setting foot into the office every second of the day.
Please do yourself a favor and do not visit this doctor. Save your skin. Save your confidence. Save your money.

originalText.text: Dr. Quintana is so professional and I trust her completely. My skin looks younger than ever! She has a great bedside manor and she always takes her appointments on time. I cannot recommend her enough!

text.text: Dr. Quintana is so professional and I trust her completely. My skin looks younger than ever! She has a great bedside manor and she always takes her appointments on time. I cannot recommend her enough!

originalText.text:
Dr. Quintana is a fantastic dermatologist. I highly recommend consulting her for any of your skin needs.

Things to love are:
1) Her way of explaining things clearly & providing step by step solutions

2) Her wide variety of services

3) Her office hours-making it easy to see her outside of business hours

4) Her efficiency in helping to treat skin concerns

5) Her personality & empathy. I can tell she is passionate about her work and cares for her patients.

I cannot recommend her enough. Thank you, Doctor!

originalText.text: Dr. Quintana is always so sweet and such a pleasure to see. You can tell she really cares about her patients and respects their concerns and preferences. She is the best in the city!!!

originalText.text: I have been going to Dr. Quintana for many years and I appreciate the personal service and attention during my appointments.
